con:call.name: Create New Task
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ser="http://service.todo/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ser:createTask> <!--Optional:--> <arg0> <!--Optional:--> <content>SoapUI created Task with no id given</content> <!--Optional:--> <endDate></endDate> <id>-1</id> <!--Optional:--> <priority>LOW</priority> <!--Optional:--> <project>SoapUI</project> <!--Optional:--> <status>Pending</status> <!--Optional:--> <title>SoapUI Task</title> </arg0> </ser:createTask> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:call.name: CreateTask Number 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ser="http://service.todo/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ser:createTask> <!--Optional:--> <arg0> <!--Optional:--> <content>SoapUI created Task at id 1</content> <!--Optional:--> <endDate></endDate> <id>1</id> <!--Optional:--> <priority>High</priority> <!--Optional:--> <project>SoapUI</project> <!--Optional:--> <status>Pending</status> <!--Optional:--> <title>SoapUI Task at 1</title> </arg0> </ser:createTask> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:call.name: Edit Task Number 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ser="http://service.todo/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ser:createTask> <!--Optional:--> <arg0> <!--Optional:--> <content>[EDIT]SoapUI created Task with no id given</content> <!--Optional:--> <endDate>[EDIT]</endDate> <id>1</id> <!--Optional:--> <priority>Normal</priority> <!--Optional:--> <project>[EDIT]SoapUI</project> <!--Optional:--> <status>Completed</status> <!--Optional:--> <title>[EDIT]SoapUI Task</title> </arg0> </ser:createTask> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
